meanings.definition: The action or process of mutating.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study mutations to understand how living things change over time.
meanings.sent2: Genetic mutations can lead to new traits in organisms.
meanings.sent3: The mutations in the DNA of the fruit flies made them grow extra eyes!
meanings.sent4: Her artistic style underwent mutations, evolving into something completely unique.
meanings.sent5: The mutations in the virus made it resistant to the medication.

meanings.definition: A change or alteration in form or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The mutations in the landscape were caused by years of erosion.
meanings.sent2: The mutations in the recipe resulted in a delicious new dish.
meanings.sent3: The mutations in the painting gave it a quirky charm.
meanings.sent4: Over time, the mutations in language reflect societal shifts.
meanings.sent5: The mutations in the music industry brought about new genres and styles.
